info.title: Turnstile API
info.description: Token bridge system for Ethereum L1 and Aztec L2 networks

get.description: Get a paginated list of all tokens

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-1000)

get.description: Get a token by its L1 or L2 address
Get a paginated list of tokens with PROPOSED status

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-1000)

get.description: Get a paginated list of tokens with REJECTED status

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-1000)

get.description: Get a paginated list of tokens with ACCEPTED status that are not yet fully bridged

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-1000)

get.description: Get a paginated list of fully bridged tokens (with both L1 and L2 addresses)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-1000)

get.description: Get a contract instance by its address, optionally including artifact data

parameters.name: includeArtifact
parameters.description: Include artifact data in the response (true/false)

get.description: Get a contract artifact by contract class ID or artifact hash

get.summary: Get contract instances by class ID
get.description: Get all contract instance addresses that match the given contract class ID
